actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 2509 of title 28 of the United States Code as to procedures in congressional reference cases.

summary.text: Makes specified procedural changes for congressional reference cases heard by the Court of Claims. Replaces the provision for a three-member review panel with a requirement that such cases be initially heard by a panel of three commissioners, acting by majority vote. (Amends 28 U.S.C. 2509).

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2509 of title 28 of the United States Code as to procedures in congressional reference cases.
